item.title: Bangalore to Rameswaram Trip Plan: 3-Day Itinerary & Tips
item.description: A road trip from Bangalore to Rameswaram is one of the most memorable long-drive experiences in South India. Whether you're a couple travelling on a bike or a family driving in a car, this 3-day travel plan covers everything you need — routes, timings, important stops, temple order, Dhanushkodi plan and safety tips. This upgraded travel guide helps you plan your trip without confusion,
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Kanyakumari Solo Trip: Travel Guide & Itinerary
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kanyakumari can be a fascinating journey, as you'll get to experience the diverse landscapes, cultural heritage and the meeting point of the Arabian Sea, the Indian Ocean and the Bay of Bengal. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Kanyakumari -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Madur
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Kovalam Solo Trip: Complete Travel Itinerary
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kovalam offers a perfect blend of relaxation, beach vibes and cultural experiences. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Tirunelveli -> Nagercoil -> Kovalam Bangalore to Kovalam Departure from Bangalore Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. item.title: Bangalore to Madurai Solo Trip: Travel Itinerary & Tips
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Madurai can be a fascinating journey, rich in history, culture and spirituality. Madurai, often referred to as the Athens of the East, is famous for its Meenakshi Amman Temple and vibrant street life.
